name: Lil' Drac
description:
Lil' Drac is hungry. Like really, really hungry.

Bite as many peasants as you can in order to keep your blood meter running high, but bite them from behind, and try not to be spotted: less your victim turn chicken.

A rapid stealth game... with chickens.

Made for the lowrezjam2016 using only 64x64 pixels and a palette consisting of only four greys.

Designed for use with an xbox 360 controller, using A to bite.

Additional support for keyboard using WASD and space or Numpad_1 to bite.
